doc.title: Cowboy Bebop: Tsuitou no yakyoku
doc.plot: Cowboy Bebop is back in this second video game adaption. This time you control Spike, Jet, Faye, and an unlock-able character you encounter in the game. And you'll experience a game like no other. As your adventure all takes place in the Cwoboy Bebop universe of 2071 A.D. You must complete missions with your skills in weaponry and combat in order to hunt down wanted bounty heads and space travel. With Edward as your resource on information, and a team of bounty hunters, there's no stopping you in earning some Woolongs.
